data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Bias per se need not be conscious. For ____, beginners ____ a field ____ fail ____ realize ____ what ____ like ____ sense ____ actually ____ in ____ of ____ particular ____. To take another example, writers can, without intent, propagate "geographical" bias by, for example, describing a dispute as it is conducted in one country, without knowing that the dispute is framed differently elsewhere.
data.partBlankContent: Bias per se need not be conscious. For exa____, beginners i_ a field of___ fail t_ realize th__ what sou___ like com___ sense i_ actually bia___ in fa___ of o__ particular vi__. To take another example, writers can, without intent, propagate "geographical" bias by, for example, describing a dispute as it is conducted in one country, without knowing that the dispute is framed differently elsewhere.
data.answer: 偏见本身不一定是有意识的。例如，某一领域的初学者往往没有意识到，听起来像是常识的东西实际上偏向于一种特定的观点。再举一个例子，作者可以无意地传播“地理”偏见，例如，描述一个争端是在一个国家进行的，而不知道该争端在其他地方的框架不同。
